description: Meeting & Work Pods are a great way to break up soft seating areas, open plan office spaces or an ideal way to create flexible meeting areas within current offices and office buildings. Combined with our large range of tables and other soft seating, you can truly complete the theme of your office and work area. Available in a wide range of fabrics, leathers and faux leathers as well as a variety of wood finishes to suit your current style and branding. Most items can be customised and are made to order. Don't see anything you like? Give us a ring with your requirements and we'll be happy to help! All items which contain foam and/or fabric are CRIB 5 Certified unless otherwise stated.
